page.title: 18 YARDLEY CHASE
page.content: In 1978 it was announced in a B.B.C. news bulletin that one of the possible sites for the third London air port was Yardley Chase. Part of the Chase is in our survey area. Eventually it was decided that 'Yardley Chase was not the place'(one of the slogans)During our research for this project we have discovered that part of the site is now designated a Site of Special Scientific Interest (S.S.S.I for short). The S.S.S.I is in a section which is used by the Ministry of Defence for training purposes A visit was arranged by the army in conjunction with the Northamptonshire Trust for Nature Conservation for us to see some of the wild-life in this protected area. There are a number of habitats present which support a variety of plants & animals(some uncommon species)
